nodes.title: prompt zit
widgets_values:
1. Subject & Action
Be specific. Who are they? What are they doing?

> An elderly gardener with wrinkled skin, rough hands, pruning red roses.

2. The Text Factor (Z-Image's Secret Weapon)
Most Turbo models fail miserably at text. Z-Image is optimized for it. If you want text in your image, write it explicitly inside quotes.

> In the background, a rustic wooden sign reads "GARDEN OF LIFE" in elegant font.

3. Visual Style & Medium
Define the texture. Is it a photo, a painting, or a 3D render?

> Shot on Leica M6, Kodak Portra 400 film grain, cinematic composition.

4. Lighting & Atmosphere
Lighting dictates realism.

> Dappled sunlight filtering through oak trees, soft backlighting, warm morning atmosphere.

nodes.title: p
widgets_values:
SUBJECT:
a cute puppy kungfu master

ACTION:
one leg in the air for a dynamic kungfu kick

ENVIRONMENT:
ancient kungfu temple

LIGHTING:
A perpetual twilight mood where the world is bathed in soft, muted light, evoking a sense of timeless serenity and contemplation

MODIFIERS:
minimalist, flat vector art, corporate artstyle, simplified shapes, modern color palette, modern conceptual art, geometric forms

nodes.title: mood
widgets_values:
textured materials like thick wool felt and knitted yarn,
digital illustration in a whimsical, cute, stylized cartoon style featuring soft, fuzzy texture that captures the intricate details of the character rendered in ultra-high resolution with subtle surface variations like tiny fibers or yarn loops. The overall aesthetic balances photorealistic precision with a stylized softness, emphasizing a cozy, tactile quality through vibrant yet muted color palettes of warm browns and creams, evoking a sense of comfort and whimsyness
